import Navbar from "./navbar"; import Nav2 from "./nav2"; import Footer from "./footer"; import "./style.css"; import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import DOMPurify from "dompurify"; export default function ReadMore() { const [post, setPost] = useState([]); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { async function fetchPost() { try { const response = await axios.get( `http://localhost:8800/api/posts/${id}` ); //for local setPost(response.data); console.log("this is the data", response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching posts:", error); } } fetchPost(); }, []); const baseURL = 'http://localhost:3000/upload/'; const url = `${baseURL}${post.img}`; return (

What’s Smartex?

{/* */}

 

{/* {post.desc} */} {/* Smartex   is a humble initiative by  Building Material Reporter —India’s fastest and most reliable media house on building materials, design, architecture, emerging technologies, and associated industries--to shape India’s future and make it, and the world, a beautiful and better place to live in, through better and state-of-the-art design,  architecture, building materials, and technology.   */}

{/*


The mega symposium & expo brings some of the finest architects, designers, builders & real estate developers, product-makers, engineers, and influencers, from across the country and beyond, on a common platform, and under one roof, for a cause that affects the future of India and the entire world.


The first edition of Smartex was held in 2023 in February in Delhi. The second edition of the hugely successful event will be held on February 9-10 in Delhi. 


In the first event, numerous well-known architects and designers participated, including  Padm Shri Sunita Kohli, the Creative Head of K2 India; Ar. P.R Mehta, Ex-President Council of Architects, Design Action Group;  Prof. Manoj Mathur, School of Planning & Architecture;  Prof. Charanjeet Singh Shah, Creative Group; Ar. Sushant Verma, Founding Partner & Design Head-rat[LAB].


For the 2024 edition,  Khan Mohammed Mustapha Khalid, the well-known architect from Bangladesh;  Ar. Samiran Banik the Founder of Kolkata-based Indecorus Consultants;  Arup Kumar Das, the famous architect and designer, and the proprietor of Design & Development -- an Architectural Consultancy firm in Guwahati; and  Prof. Soumyendu Shankar Ray, the founding director of the School of Architecture and Planning, Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar, Odisha; and Prof. Charanjit Singh Shah, Director,  Creative Group, Delhi; among others, have already confirmed their participation.  

 
Smartex 2024 is likely to be an equally, if not more, exciting and successful event, and open up a whole new world of endless possibilities for all stakeholders. So, save your dates! Don’t miss this event!

{" "} */}
